reviewText: wife here: Exposes the sad truth that the United Nations is a corrupt vehicle for 'self aggrandizing profit, sex, power and a secret club for the rich and powerful'. Disgusting is the word to describe the United Nations now.  After a time, even the most noble institution becomes a business. So has the United Nations.  A self serving business.
The disc quality was adequate for a used copy. It never skipped or had difficulty being played. The film itself was informative.  I've lent it out repeatedly.
This was a real eye opener. If you think that the UN is a worthwhile or necessary institution, you should see this film.  I only wish it were more readily available.

I hope this documentary is again made available on DVD. I had downloaded it onto my iPod from iTunes and wished I could get the DVD, but it was and still is unavailable. This documentary makes you realize what a waste the UN is on all levels.
